story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful country of Armenia, there lived a young boy named Aram. Aram had big dreams and a kind heart, but he often felt lonely as his parents worked long hours in the fields to provide for their family.

One night, as Aram lay in bed gazing at the stars through his window, he heard a soft rustling sound coming from outside. Curious, he tiptoed to the window and saw a glowing light floating in the distance. Intrigued, Aram decided to follow the light, and it led him through the forest to a magical clearing.

In the clearing, Aram discovered a majestic tree with shimmering leaves that whispered in the breeze. As he approached the tree, he heard a gentle voice calling his name. "Aram, dear child, you possess a special gift that can bring joy and light to all those around you," the voice said.

With a sense of wonder and excitement, Aram reached out to touch the tree, and a shower of sparkling lights filled the clearing, illuminating the night sky. The tree began to sing a melodic lullaby, calming Aram's worries and filling him with a sense of peace.

From that night on, Aram visited the magical tree often, seeking its wisdom and comfort. He learned to embrace his gift of kindness and compassion, spreading joy and light wherever he went. And as he shared his light with others, he found that his loneliness disappeared, replaced by a sense of belonging and connection.

And so, dear child, remember that even in the darkest nights, there is always light to guide you. May the magic of the shimmering tree remind you of the power of kindness and love, and may your dreams be filled with wonder and joy.

Goodnight, little one, and sleep well, knowing that you are cherished and loved.
